entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:15 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Light snow. Blowing snow at times. Wind northeast 30 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:15 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 5:15 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022
